description:
Taylor Swift fans have been ecstatic for the release of her new album, The Tortured Poets Department. While many fans have been praising Swift’s new music, others have been critical. In fact, Taylor Swift has been facing backlash from some fans that believe a few specific song lyrics “can’t be real.” It’s been one of [...]

The post Taylor Swift Faces Backlash For Song Lyrics That “Can’t Be Real” According To Fans appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Taylor Swift Faces Backlash For Song Lyrics That “Can’t Be Real” According To Fans

description:
The Resident Evil film franchise began with 2002’s Resident Evil. It launched a series of financially successful films loosely based on the hit video games. A more faithful film adaptation of the original two games was released in 2021, and now it looks like a new Resident Evil movie is in the works. As of [...]

The post ‘Resident Evil’ New Movie Reportedly In The Works From Screen Gems appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Resident Evil’ New Movie Reportedly In The Works From Screen Gems

description:
Nicolas Cage and John Travolta both starred in the hit 1997 action film Face/Off. Now, close to three decades later, it looks like the two actors could be returning for Face/Off 2. Both Cage and Travolta are rumored to star in the long-gestating continuation. Director Adam Wingard has been teasing a Face/Off sequel for years, [...]

The post Nicolas Cage And John Travolta Reportedly Returning For ‘Face/Off 2’ appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Nicolas Cage And John Travolta Reportedly Returning For ‘Face/Off 2’
